nachos.machine

Class MIPS

  • java.lang.Object
    • nachos.machine.CPU
      • nachos.machine.MIPS

  • public class MIPS
extends CPU
    MIPS emulator, for simulating the execution of user programs running on top of Nachos.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int BadVAddrReg
      The failing virtual address on a page fault exception.

      The total number of registers.

      Current program counter.
      static int PrevPCReg
      Previous program counter (for debugging).
      static int RetAddrReg
      Register that holds return address for procedure calls.
      static int StackReg
      User's stack pointer.
      Statistics stats
      Collect statistics.
